data.eml:eml: A new Polychrysia (Lepidoptera, Noctuidae, Plusiinae) species from China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Saldaitis, Aidas, Benedek, Balázs (2015): A new Polychrysia (Lepidoptera, Noctuidae, Plusiinae) species from China. Zootaxa 3974 (2): 290-296, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3974.2.12
